mapper.select:
select distinct e.eqm_cd, e.eqm_fg, e.eqm_nm, e.eqm_mdl, e.eqm_spec, e.eqm_co, to_char(e.purc_dt,'yyyy/MM/dd') "purc_dt", e.purc_amt, e.li_no, e.emp_id, e.energy, e.lf, e.temp, e.uph, e.eqm_img, e.prcs_cd, e.eqm_yn from eqm e
join prcs pc on e.prcs_cd = pc.prcs_cd join prcs_pr pp on pc.prcs_cd = pp.prcs_cd join prdt pd on pp.prdt_cd = pd.prdt_cd
where 1=1
and( e.eqm_cd like '%'||#{eqmParam}||'%' or e.eqm_nm like '%'||#{eqmParam}||'%' )
AND trunc(e.purc_dt) >= #{dtStt}
AND trunc(e.purc_dt) <= #{dtEnd}
AND e.eqm_yn = 'Y'
AND e.eqm_yn = 'N'
order by e.eqm_cd
mapper.update: update eqm set eqm_fg = #{eqmFg}, eqm_nm = #{eqmNm}, eqm_mdl = #{eqmMdl}, eqm_spec = #{eqmSpec}, eqm_co = #{eqmCo}, purc_dt = #{purcDt}, purc_amt = #{purcAmt}, li_no = #{liNo}, emp_id = #{empId}, energy = #{energy}, lf = #{lf}, temp = #{temp}, uph = #{uph}, eqm_img = #{eqmImg}, prcs_cd = #{prcsCd}, eqm_yn = #{eqmYn} where eqm_cd = #{eqmCd}
